thread.title: Airline launches training scheme to develop a new generation of pilots
thread.title_full: Airline launches training scheme to develop a new generation of pilots | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Airline launches training scheme to develop a new generation of pilots
text:
Becoming a pilot is a dream job for many but, at a cost of more than a Â£100,000, it's not easy to turn that dream into reality.
Pilot training is expensive and there's pressure on airlines to do more to help.
But if you're thinking about it there are a number of opportunities out there, with one airline running a sponsored training scheme.
Click below to watch a report from ITV's Lauren Hall
